Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: You've done a great job with the meal.
Speaker.line2: Though it is not perfect to my liking, everything looks absolutely delicious.

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: Has your duty here completed, dear?
Speaker.line2: You deserve a break after such a long service.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I'm afraid I must remain, ma'am.
Speaker.line2: We need to ensure the tea is brewed to perfection for your best enjoyment.

Speaker.name: Martha_Happy
Speaker.line1: Oh, really? What a considerate service!
Speaker.line2: I hope you wouldn't mind continuing our conversation for a while longer.
